title: Interpretation of a dream about God descending to earth, seeing God in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing God in a dream? Seeing God speaking to me Interpretation of seeing God in human form Hearing the voice of God in a dream Talking with God in a dream God’s words in a dream Seeing God in a dream Ibn Taymiyyah Interpretation of a dream of hearing the voice of God Almighty The coming of the Almighty Creator in a special place, or His appearance upon Him, with His attributes Praiseworthy: The victory of the oppressed, the destruction of the oppressors, and the death of the sick. Because God is right. Perhaps it indicates the destruction of this place. Whoever dreams that God Almighty has descended on a land, city, village, neighborhood, and the like, declares that God Almighty will grant victory to the people of that place and give them victory over their enemies. Dream of seeing God in the form of a familiar person. Whoever sees that God Almighty is in the form of a well-known man shows that this man He is all-powerful and omnipotent. She dreams of seeing God in a way other than what we have mentioned. And whoever sees God Almighty in a way other than what we have all mentioned is one type of what is legitimate, it is good in every case. And whoever sees that God said to him: Come to me, it is clear that his time is near. Whoever dreams that God Almighty gets angry On the people of a place indicates that the judge of that place is inclined to rule and that he is unjust to the people, or his scholar is not religious, and if the dreamer is a thief, his foot falls. This indicates that the fortuneteller is also guilty and worthy of punishment, and sadness and turmoil occur in that place. A dream about preaching evil to His Majesty. Whoever dreams that God gives him good news of evil indicates the wrath of God Almighty upon him, let him fear God and improve his deeds. The decision to see God in a dream YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about buying bread in a dream

preview.html: There are many interpretations and opinions about the interpretation of buying bread in a dream, which vary depending on the color and shape of the bread, so buying bread as a whole is a vision that indicates the acquisition of abundant halal money. You may be interested in meeting a child in a dream, while seeing black bread in a dream indicates that there are many problems. And the issues that he wants to get rid of. You may be interested: Insulting religion in a dream. Interpretation of buying bread in a dream. If you see yourself buying bread in a dream, this indicates that the person with the vision will get a lot of money from work. Seeing bread in a dream that tastes good indicates an excessive increase In the prices of food products. Also, if he sees a married woman buying bread in his dream, this means that he will become pregnant soon. While seeing dry bread in a dream indicates poverty and the loss of many good opportunities. As for seeing eating clean white bread in a dream about the love of the husband and children And enjoy a calm and stable life. Seeing an unmarried woman buying bread in a dream means that she will marry in the near future to a well-off person, and God knows best. Interpretation of buying bread in a dream Buying bread in a man’s dream Seeing a bread market in a man’s dream indicates many signs, including: Seeing a young man Buying bread in a dream indicates the stability of a quiet life that a young man will enjoy in the future. While seeing dry and black bread indicates poverty and misery, whether in practical or scientific life. Many scholars also believe that seeing white bread in a dream for someone indicates The date of his marriage to a beautiful girl is approaching. Seeing many loaves of bread in a dream means that the dreamer will obtain a prominent position by obtaining a new job from which he will earn a lot of money. As for seeing eating spoiled bread in a man’s dream, it is not a good vision and indicates the presence of many problems. In the life of the person having the vision. You may be interested in: Flatulence in a dream Buying local bread in a dream If one sees buying local bread in his dream, this indicates that there are some difficult crises and problems facing the dreamer. It is also a vision that indicates the presence of many haters and envious people. In the life of insight, especially when he sees a corrupt life. As for seeing soft bread in a person’s dream, it is a vision that indicates the approach of comfort and happiness. One of the bad dreams of local bread in a person’s dream is to see it warm, as it indicates the weakness of the dreamer’s personality and his suffering from tension and family pressure. Seeing an unmarried woman in her dream black bread indicates To her inability to bear many of the responsibilities and judgments that fall upon her. Seeing a married woman buying bread in her dream means that she is close to pregnancy and is following a semi-halal diet for her and her husband. As for seeing a

title: Learn about the interpretation of a snake in a dream for an unmarried woman from Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq and the interpretation of a dream about a green snake for an unmarried woman

preview.html: A snake in a dream for a single womanIt is difficult for an unmarried woman to meet a snake in her dream in its various forms, regardless of what happened in the dream. Sometimes this snake chases him or sees the snake pounce on him and bite him. Interpretations of a snake in a dream for a single woman, so follow us. A snake in a dream for a single woman. The meaning of a dream about a snake for a single woman varies depending on its shape and size, in addition to the action mentioned in the dream. As for the small snake, it is no less dangerous than the large snake, as it represents problems that plague them constantly and at the same time. Time has a strong personality and can dispose of it properly. If there are many snakes in a girl’s dream, it can be said that the conflicts that are hurting her have become strong and the enemies around her intend to betray her, so she must be prepared to face some difficulties in the future. The snake in the dream of a son Sirin: If you are a single girl and are looking for the meaning of a snake in a dream from Ibn Sirin, then through the dream interpretation website we show that his interpretations are ready to warn from the beginning, and this is because it represents conflicts. The injustice that comes from the enemy, but if this snake is far away and does not harm the girl, explains some of the burdens that she will bear, but she will be strong, God willing, and will not be harmed because of it. They are.Ibn Sirin warns a married or married girl or woman who sees a snake or snake in her dream, as he says that this person does not have good morals and she should not complete this relationship with him because she will get into many problems. And damage due to him, and she will not be reassured in her future life next to him. Among the signs of the snake appearing on a man, according to the scholar Ibn Sirin, is that it is a sign of a friend who lies to him, and his betrayal in dealing with him, because sometimes he finds honesty from him while he is around. Other times he sees mistreatment and exonerates him. There are some warnings and he must pay attention to them before he becomes a victim of this person. The snake in the dream of Imam Al-Sadiq. Imam Al-Sadiq explains many things related to the dream of snakes and confirms that seeing the black snake confirms the many disagreements between the dreamer and his family as a result of the private life he lives, and some try Interference and collapse. One of the signs that a snake is chasing a person in a dream is an indication that he has made some mistakes or made inappropriate decisions, so he should think carefully before making some decisions and resort to the help of those around him if he is confused. Enter the Dream Interpretation website online from Google and search for all the interpretations you are looking for. The most important interpretations of seeing a snake in a dream. The snake in a single woman’s dream. Seeing a small snake abounds in girls’ dreams, and we find that most of them search for its meaning on various social networking sites and search sites, and we can focus on the fact that it is a symbol of the enemy that is characterized by He has an intense hatred for the sleeper, but he also does not have the strength to harm him, yet he will try to influence his life and deal with him deceitfully. Lying This could represent an unstable relationship, either

title: Interpretation of a dream about the agony of death: seeing death in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about death by Ibn SirinInterpretation of death in a dream by Ibn SirinInterpretation of a dream about feeling the pain of deathInterpretation of a dream about a death disputeInterpretation of a dream about death by Ibn SirinI dreamed that I died in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about deathWhat is the interpretation of death?And the intoxication of death came - a slave who was the servant of Moses Al-Hadi, he loved her very much, and while one day she was singing to him, an idea He was absent from her and her color, and some passers-by said to him: What is this, O Commander of the Faithful? He said: It occurred to me that I would die and that my brother Harun would assume the caliphate after me and marry this servant of mine (I left). Then he called his brother Harun and told him what happened, so Al-Rashid sought refuge from him, so Al-Hadi swore to him a heavy vow of divorce, manipulation, Hajj, walking barefoot and not marrying her, you and me? He said: I will make amends for you and for me, so he married her and had a grandfather until he slept in his room and did not move for fear of harassing her. While she was sleeping one night, she woke up terrified and crying, and he said to her: What is the matter with you? He said: O Commander of the Faithful, I saw Hadi in this dream, and he said: You broke your oath after you surrounded the inhabitants of the graves, and you forgot me, and broke your vows, immoral lies, and had sex with a treacherous brother, who believed him who described you as a traitor. You became among the people of sorrow and returned among the dead. Do not miss the new millennium and do not stray from your circles. You have met me. Before morning, where I arrived, YouTube fragments of YouTube were deadly

title: Interpretation of a dream about the sea for single, pregnant and divorced women

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the sea in a dream for single, pregnant and divorced women. Dreams are considered signs and indications of what may happen in the dreamer’s life, which includes many surprises for the dreamer. The interpretation of dreams depends on their interpretation of the situation in which the dreamer is, as many people want to get an interpretation of their dreams. It depends on his social status, whether he is married or not, and here we learn about the interpretation of a dream about the sea in a dream as indicated in some interpretations. Dreaming about a calm sea and its interpretation in a dream. Seeing a calm sea in a dream symbolizes comfort, stability, and great benefit from knowledge, scholars, or owners. Influence and prestige. Perhaps seeing a calm sea in a dream indicates a good king who benefits people. Interpretation of a dream about a calm sea and interpretation of a dream about a calm sea and its interpretation in a dream are as follows: Interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream and its meaning. Whoever sees the sea while it is calm and the person is fresher, this is evidence of his stability, success and excellence in his life. If you see the sea calm and you get married, this indicates prosperity, happiness and security in your married life. If you are a merchant and see the sea in your dream, you will get a lot of profits and a lot of food. If an unmarried girl sees this calm sea in her dream, this indicates love and happiness for her. Interpretation of seeing the seashore in a dream. Whoever sees the sea in his dream shows an abundant search for knowledge, Because in this case the sea is calm for the soul and a balance for the mind. If you see the sea and it is calm in your dream, your wish for food or happiness will come true. The calm sea is also interpreted as healing for the sick. Whoever sees the sea as a stranger returns to his homeland, and whoever sees the sea as a captive will be liberated, because The calmness of the sea is one of the signs of goodness in our dreams. Interpretation of a dream about sea level rising in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about sea level rising in the dreamer’s dream is as follows: Ibn Sirin said that if the sea level rose until it reached a flood, then the dream shows many meanings, the most important of which is that the place in which he lives The dreamer will soon collapse due to increasing unrest and sins. It commits the population, and this interpretation is specific to demolishing houses in a dream and causing trees to be uprooted, destroying cars, shops, etc. If the dreamer sees a flood in his dream, but it did not arouse fear in anyone’s heart and did not cause anyone’s death, then the dream expresses the imminent victory of the country. Dreamer. Seeing the sea in a dream with someone you love. If the sea water is red, this is an unpleasant sign of disease that will spread throughout the country. If a married woman sees a flood in her dream, but she climbed to the top of her house and the water did not reach her, and she woke up from the dream without being hurt. The dream is good and indicates that she survived. . From the evil that was near her. If the Virgin saw in her dream a deadly flood and wanted to escape from it, but did not realize it, then a strong young man came to her and saved her from loss, from all the evil that surrounded her in her life. Interpretation of seeing the dark sea in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the sea In a dream for a person it is as follows: the only man

title: Interpretation of pigeons in a dream

preview.html: Here is the interpretation of a dove in a dream, that unknown dream, that some do not know its exact meaning and whether it indicates the appearance of good or evil. In general, birds are considered among the most beautiful creatures of God, which some people prefer to grow at home and take care of them themselves. But seeing a dove in a dream indicates a happy event for the dreamer or something unpleasant for him, and does the interpretation differ depending on its color and location in the dream? This is what we will know in an encyclopedia that presents to you the meaning of this dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation and what it means for single women, pregnant women, and married women. Interpretation of bathing in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin gave different interpretations of this dream in the following cases: Seeing a dove generally means goodness, increased sustenance, a feeling of happiness, and love for the Lord. Whoever dreams of a dead dove holding it, this symbolizes failure to achieve what the dreamer wants in reality. If a dove is seen standing on its back or shoulder, this foretells a happy event that will have a major role in improving the fortuneteller’s circumstances, and God knows best. If the sound of a dove is heard, this symbolizes the situation. The bad psychology of the vision and how sad it is in reality. It also indicates something hateful, which is hearing sad news, and God knows best. Colored pigeons in a dream indicate success and excellence and also indicate achieving the goals that the dreamer was striving to achieve in reality. Seeing white pigeons indicates prosperity and goodness for the dreamer. Seeing a small dove in a dream represents good news for the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing a dove in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a dove in a dream for an unmarried woman promises her good news about the arrival of a happy event for her in reality, i.e. an engagement or a wedding for her. If you see the feathers of a dove, this dream means The dreamer’s wedding date is approaching. Seeing a white dove in a dream also indicates the dreamer’s earliest engagement date. Whoever sees a lot of doves in her dream, this indicates that she will marry a generous person who will make her happy in her life. Interpretation of doves for a married woman. Doves in a married woman’s dream indicate good health. Pregnancy, which is short, and God knows best. Seeing black feathers in a married woman’s dream indicates that something bad will happen to her, which is that she will be betrayed. Seeing a black dove is unpleasant for a married woman, as it indicates the emergence of problems in her marital life that will lead to divorce, and God knows best. If You saw a slaughtered white dove in a married woman’s dream, this also indicates problems in marriage. Hearing the sound of a dove in a married woman’s dream indicates the happiness and joy she feels in her married life. Interpretation of a dream about bathing for a pregnant woman: Seeing a dove in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates ease of childbirth. Pigeon eggs or small doves indicate that the woman with the vision will give birth to a girl, but if she sees a lot of doves, this indicates that she will give birth to a boy, and God knows best. All the interpretations that we have presented to you in this article are nothing but the efforts of interpretation scholars, and God alone knows the unseen, even if If you want to interpret another dream, you can download the instant dream interpretation application.
preview.text: Here is the interpretation of a dove in a dream, that unknown dream, that some do not know its exact meaning and whether it indicates the appearance of good or evil. In general, birds are considered among the most beautiful creatures of God, which some people prefer to grow at home and take care of them themselves. But seeing a dove in a dream indicates a happy event for the dreamer or something unpleasant for him, and does the interpretation differ depending on its color and location in the dream? This is what we will know in an encyclopedia that presents to you the meaning of this dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation and what it means for single women, pregnant women, and married women. Interpretation of bathing in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin gave different interpretations of this dream in the following cases: Seeing a dove generally means goodness, increased sustenance, a feeling of happiness, and love for the Lord. Whoever dreams of a dead dove holding it, this symbolizes failure to achieve what the dreamer wants in reality. If a dove is seen standing on its back or shoulder, this foretells a happy event that will have a major role in improving the fortuneteller’s circumstances, and God knows best. If the sound of a dove is heard, this symbolizes the situation. The bad psychology of the vision and how sad it is in reality. It also indicates something hateful, which is hearing sad news, and God knows best. Colored pigeons in a dream indicate success and excellence and also indicate achieving the goals that the dreamer was striving to achieve in reality. Seeing white pigeons indicates prosperity and goodness for the dreamer. Seeing a small dove in a dream represents good news for the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing a dove in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a dove in a dream for an unmarried woman promises her good news about the arrival of a happy event for her in reality, i.e. an engagement or a wedding for her. If you see the feathers of a dove, this dream means The dreamer’s wedding date is approaching. Seeing a white dove in a dream also indicates the dreamer’s earliest engagement date. Whoever sees a lot of doves in her dream, this indicates that she will marry a generous person who will make her happy in her life. Interpretation of doves for a married woman. Doves in a married woman’s dream indicate good health. Pregnancy, which is short, and God knows best. Seeing black feathers in a married woman’s dream indicates that something bad will happen to her, which is that she will be betrayed. Seeing a black dove is unpleasant for a married woman, as it indicates the emergence of problems in her marital life that will lead to divorce, and God knows best. If You saw a slaughtered white dove in a married woman’s dream, this also indicates problems in marriage. Hearing the sound of a dove in a married woman’s dream indicates the happiness and joy she feels in her married life. Interpretation of a dream about bathing for a pregnant woman: Seeing a dove in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates ease of childbirth. Pigeon eggs or small doves indicate that the woman with the vision will give birth to a girl, but if she sees a lot of doves, this indicates that she will give birth to a boy, and God knows best. All the interpretations that we have presented to you in this article are nothing but the efforts of interpretation scholars, and God alone knows the unseen, even if If you want to interpret another dream, you can download the instant dream interpretation application.

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about dyeing hair for a married woman in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about dyeing hair for a married woman: Many women like to change their appearance in several ways, including dyeing their hair in different colors, and when she sees that in a dream, a married woman wonders what is the interpretation of that? Does the interpretation bring her good, and is she waiting for us to give her good tidings, or is she evil and seeking refuge from her? We will answer all these questions through this article by presenting the largest number of explanations and explanations that go back to the great scholars and commentators such as the scholar Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about dyeing hair for a married woman. The vision of dyeing hair for a married woman has many connotations and signs that can be recognized in the following cases: Dyeing indicates Hair in a dream for a married woman indicates positive changes that will soon happen to her in her life, making her very happy and enjoyable. If a married woman sees that she has dyed and dyed her hair in a dream and it looks beautiful, this means that she has repented for her past sins and transgressions, and God has forgiven her. Seeing a Woman A married woman dyeing her hair in a dream means hearing good news and the appearance of joys and happy occasions. Interpretation of a dream about dyeing hair for a married woman by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin addressed the interpretation of a dream about dyeing hair for a married woman, and the following are some of the interpretations he received: Ibn Sirin believes that the dream of dyeing hair in... A married woman’s dream brings her good news. If the dreamer sees that she is dyeing her hair in a dream, this symbolizes her long life, health, and luxury that she will enjoy. Seeing hair dye in a married woman’s dream indicates abundance of money and a lot of halal money that she will get from work or inheritance. Interpretation of a dream about dyeing hair for a pregnant woman: During pregnancy, a woman sees many dreams with symbols that are difficult for her to interpret, and the interpretation of her dream about dyeing hair in a dream is as follows: A pregnant woman who sees in her dream that she is dyeing her hair indicates that she will give birth to a girl with a beautiful face and in good health, and she will have a future. Great. If a pregnant woman sees herself dyeing her hair red in a dream, this indicates her intense love for her husband and the stability of their married life. Dyeing hair in a pregnant woman’s dream is good news to facilitate her birth and preserve her health and the health of her newborn. Interpretation of a dream about dyeing blonde hair for a married woman. The interpretation varies. A dream about dyeing hair in a married woman’s dream of a different color, especially blond, is as follows: If a married woman dreams of dyeing her hair blond and is sad, this symbolizes her being affected by envy and the evil eye. Dyeing blond hair in a married woman’s dream indicates her high status and the achievement of her closest goal, which she She sought it. The death of blonde hair in a married woman’s dream indicates her long life and the health that she will enjoy. Interpretation of a dream about dyeing black hair for a married woman: A married woman who sees in a dream that she is dyeing her hair black shows her commitment to the teachings of her religion, and that she is quick to do good that brings her closer to God. Painting trees black in a married woman’s dream indicates her good condition and clean bed

title: Learn about the meanings of saying “There is no god but God” in Ibn Sirin’s dream

preview.html: Saying there is no god but God in a dream is considered one of the favorite visions of the soul as it is inferred from goodness. Therefore, in this article, many interpretations have been presented by the most famous dream interpretation scholars, such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Al-Usaimi and others. All you have to do is start reading. Saying there is no god but God in a dream. All the ancient books on dream interpretation that say there is no god but God confirm that it is a sign of the dreamer’s closeness to the Lord (Glory be to Him). In ways that please God Almighty, and if the dreamer hears saying: There is no god but God in his dream, it gives him abundant good news of goodness that he will obtain without knowing it. When a person says in his dream that there is no god but God and feels general happiness, this means that the period of despair that he had He lives that it is over and that he will be able to achieve what he wants, and he will achieve what he wants. By any means possible, except for its length in the future. Saying “There is no god but God” in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explains that seeing a dreamer who says “There is no god but God” in a dream proves the good that will happen to him, and if the dreamer is a sinner and commits many sins and hears his saying “There is no god but God” “. God in his dream expresses his inner desire to get closer to God and stay away from the sins he committed. When a person feels despair and disappointment and sees the phrase “There is no other god” in his dream, this indicates that happiness is approaching him and will live here. Seeing the fortuneteller himself uttering the phrase “There is no god but God” in the dream symbolizes the positive things that will happen in his life and the achievement of what he has achieved. He desires it, such as obtaining a promotion in his profession or also an expression of a change in his condition for the better in all respects, and moreover this is an indication of the blessings that he will receive from where he does not count. Which has a website Dream Interpretation Secrets from Google, there are many Interpretations and questions about followers that you can see. Saying there is no god but God in a dream for an unmarried woman. When a girl sees her saying in a dream the phrase “There is no god but God,” it means that she has heard news that will make her happy and, moreover, which will ease the situation in any matter Related She couldn't find her way. By herself and the good character that everyone who knew her testifies to. A dream that mentions the phrase “There is no god but God” comes to the girl’s dream because of her immunity from the evil of what God created and warns her of some people who do not like goodness so that she should pay attention to them and not deal with them. If the Virgin Mary said the phrase “There is no god but God” in her dream while she was about to die in her dream, this proves that she fell into a serious dilemma, but she will overcome it easily. Saying “There is no god but God” in a dream to a married woman. When a married woman says the phrase “There is no god but God” in her dream, it is a burning feeling in her dream, and it indicates that she is in a major crisis from which she needs a miracle from the Creator to get out of it. Therefore, patience is necessary for God to provide her with the means of redress. It indicates the abundance of livelihood that comes to her from places she does not expect, even if the woman herself wants to become pregnant, she may

title: What you do not know about the interpretation of an earthquake in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about an earthquake and knowing its causes: An earthquake is one of the horrific natural disasters that caused great human and material losses to many people. Because it leads to the destruction of many buildings built for exorbitant sums, and therefore seeing an earthquake in a dream is one of the visions that cause panic in the dreamer. Interpretation of an earthquake in a dream: Ibn Sirin said: If a pregnant woman dreams of an earthquake demolishing one of the walls of her house, this is evidence that her death is approaching. If the dreamer sees in If he dreamed that there was a strong earthquake in his house and he was very afraid in the dream, this is evidence that he will feel psychological tension and a lack of security and stability in his life. It is an unpleasant vision if the patient sees the earthquake in his dream. Because it confirms the imminence of his death, the dreamer’s vision that the earthquake is destroying everything around him and he wants to escape in the dream, but he was unable. This vision confirms that the problems in the dreamer’s life are greater than his level of capabilities. When a young man sees the earthquake in his dream, and everything around him is falling in front of him, and he is trembling from fear. Fear, this vision confirms that the dreamer will get involved in a problem with a person, and therefore they will remain afraid and nervous about developing the topic or increasing the complexity of the problem. If the dreamer sees in his home that the earthquake caused damage to buildings and demolished many homes, this is evidence of the emergence of many epidemics that will spread In the country or the conflict that will penetrate the country and cause comprehensive destruction in it. If the dreamer works in agriculture and sees that the land on which he works is shaken by the severity of the earthquake, then this vision is praiseworthy. Because it indicates an increase in the yield of this land, and the growth of many crops within it. An earthquake in a pregnant woman’s dream with the destruction and demolition of homes, and the rise of dust and dirt in the dream, is evidence of some health problems for the pregnant woman during her birth, but if she sees the earthquake in her sleep without feeling stressed or Fear, this is evidence that her birth will be characterized by ease and ease. If the dreamer is married and has children and sees a violent earthquake in his dream, this is evidence that this man is hasty and never makes wise decisions in his life, but his emotions lead him, but his mind is not exploited. This thing will destroy his life and the lives of everyone with him. When a person sees an earthquake in his dream and is able to escape from it without consequences or injuries, this is evidence of his ability to overcome any problem or get out of it unscathed. If a married young man dreams of a violent earthquake, this means that his feelings towards... His beloved will change for the worse. Interpretation of a dream about an earthquake for a married woman: If a married woman sees in her dream that an earthquake caused the ground to split and abundant water to flow from it, then this is evidence of comfort after distress, support after need, and abundant money after the extreme poverty she suffered from. When a married woman sees That the earthquake that she saw in the dream caused gold and precious metals to come out of the ground, then this is evidence of the wealth that this woman will find, and this vision confirms that she will achieve any goal she wanted to achieve. Before, but it failed, so that the vision confirms that God has a history AD
